title: 317A.687 ABANDONMENT.
text:
Subject to any contractual rights, after a conversion is approved, and at any time before articles of conversion are delivered to the secretary of state for filing under section 317A.685, a converting corporation may amend the plan or abandon the conversion:
(1) as provided in the plan; or
(2) except as otherwise prohibited in the plan, by the same consent as was required to approve the plan.
